::Aerotaur::
       He shrugs and hits a few keys bringing it up on a screen.  He sighs. 
"It's them again.  And Virgo."  He shakes his head.  "Maybe they'll just go 
away if we stay inside."

--part1_146.7df8dac.2975ef37_boundary
